code_network_nexthop_metric.NETWORK: R - RIP-derived, O - OSPF-derived, C - connected, S - static, i - IS-IS-derived, B - BGP-derived, E - EIGRP, H - HSLS-derived, L - LDP-derived, D - static default, S - summary (component route), K

code_network_nexthop_metric_local_pref_w.WEIGHT: - OSPF-derived, C - connected, S - static, i - IS-IS-derived, B - BGP-derived, E - EIGRP, H - HSLS-derived, L - LDP-derived, D - static default, S - summary (component route), K - kernel-derived

cli_content:
IP Route Table for Process Routes

Codes: R - RIP-derived, O - OSPF-derived, C - connected, S - static, i - IS-IS-derived, B - BGP-derived, E - EIGRP, H - HSLS-derived, L - LDP-derived, D - static default, S - summary (component route), K - kernel-derived

    Network          Next Hop        Metric    LocPrf     Weight    Path
C   10.0.0.0/8       0.0.0.0         1                          
R   172.16.0.0/16    10.1.1.2        2                            
S   192.168.1.0/24   0.0.0.0         0                          
O   203.0.113.0/24   10.2.2.2        20           200         100
textfsm_template:
Value CODE (\S+)
Value NETWORK (\d+\.\d+\.\d+\.\d+\/\d+)
Value NEXTHOP (\d+\.\d+\.\d+\.\d+)
Value METRIC (\d+)
Value LOCAL_PREF (\d*)
Value WEIGHT (\d*)

Start
  ^\s*(${CODE})\s+${NETWORK}\s+${NEXTHOP}\s+${METRIC}\s+${LOCAL_PREF}?\s+${WEIGHT}?\s*$$ -> Record
